channel.title: Can someone make me a song with only AP-005?
channel.description: This pack is the one I want the most, but I want to make sure if he’s perfect and what are the sounds inside. Can someone make me a preview please?

item.title: Can someone make me a song with only AP-005?
item.dc:creator: IAATOE
item.description:
Yes, but he wants a project showcasing the different settings and capabilities of the individual instruments. @TheCreeperMatik has made such a project. You can’t obtain soundpack demo projects without buying the soundpack which is the issue that is trying to be overcome.
